post.body: I can say we have two chihuahuas that are great at going around corners to let us know ahead of time where they are >:)
creepy, though, huh? We search the whole house before disarming. ADT was quick on the call. I'm impressed.
now that I think of it, that seems to be a running theme with all weaponry... both real and figuratively.
I'll never tell. I firmly believe no one should know how many guns you have and where they unless you're police asking.
thanks. who know. maybe they always try for that one chance the door is unlocked.
awesome, can't wait to read it more. Congrats on the book.
I want one, too. That's awesome! A friend showed me his iPhone he cracked that streams live video to flixwagon. Awesome.
got your tweet late. I can't wait to see your post on it. I think WATE listed pots where you can see safely.
thanks for the link. Reading it.
No, it'a another Neil.. my old college roomate from MTSU days.
Neil was singing Beyonce a minute ago...
When the servant is the leader: 3 posts from 3 Nashville area blogs in the NIT Morning Browser http://www.nashvilleistalking.com/node/89532
and wouldn't it happen on the one night we forget to lock the door?
the ADT alarm went off this AM - we found the front door slightly open. Thank goodness for $40 a month or there would have been dead people.
NASHVILLEWX: thick fog this morning. high in the low 40s. Jeff says a few showers in the warm air to the south - http://nashvillewx.com
good morning :)
local blogs on Southern Baptist Pastor Rick Warren's selection to give the 2009 Inaugural invocation - http://www.urlzen.com/3zm
Another awesome day has come and gone with at least one accomplishment. Signing off from Studio A at the mighty Deuce ~
"But it's Christmas" should really only apply when it's actually Christmas.
Remind me to save vacation time for December. I forgot how Christmas is a month long excuse in TN for people not to work.
Why do the talkers-about-it get way more attention than the people actually doing it?
Neighbor says there are too many people living next door to his South Nashville home - http://www.urlzen.com/3z9
long power lunch full of whispered name dropping...
Have you seen a Mesed Up VW Jetta with Florida tags? Help a local hit and run victim : http://www.urlzen.com/3ys
I'm trying to arange a Christmas surprise and it's so tough keeping the secret.
Signing off from the well lit Studio A down to the mighty Deuce ~
probably smells better than you right now.
Has anyone seen any TN conservative blogger write about the TVA coal waste disaster? I'd like to balance my posts. #coalash #tvaspill
Tennessee bloggers confused over EPA and TVA water quality tests - http://www.nashvilleistalking.com/node/91049 #coalash #tvaspill
There's something about the longest nights of the year that bring area bloggers there: http://www.nashvilleistalking.com/node/90930
NASHVILLEWX: Davis calls it an "ice fog" and says you'll be scraping your windshiled this morning. High in mid 50s - http://nashvillewx.com
TVA detains bloggers for taking pictures of coal waste spill - http://www.nashvilleistalking.com/node/90840 - #coalash #tvaspill
Signing off from Studio A at the Mighty Deuce ~ Y'all have a great weekend :)
And balance would be a good thing.
If you are a conservative TN blogger and you've written about the TVA coal waste spill, can you DM me the link? So far it's just liberals.
Vince and Neil are getting stupid already, and I'm jealous - http://www.christiangrantham.com/
Here is a list of "toxic releases" the EPA found at TVA's Kingston Fossil Plant - http://www.urlzen.com/46d #coalash #tvaspill
EPA's response to the TVA coal waste disaster - http://www.epa.gov/region4/kingston/index.html #coalash #tvaspill
According to this document, TVA's Kingston Fossil Plant produces 1424 tons of fly ash per day - http://www.urlzen.com/46c #coalash #tvaspill
I added a few more Tennessee blog posts on the TVA coal waste spill story - http://www.nashvilleistalking.com/node/90649 #coalash #tvaspill
